en: The keyhole has vanished, making it impossible to pick.
What... the hell? Are you guys seeing what I'm seeing?
This leads downstairs and outside of the school.
I should be able to find everything I need on this floor.
What are you doing? Are we done already?
Really? I guess I'll go get my stuff.
I am a little creeped out but...
I'm going to finish what I started.
Well, that didn't go as planned.
I don't think I've ever seen anybody use it.
Say, why don't we check it out?
You want to break into this room...?
Why not? Can't be any worse than trying a silly ritual.
We would need a way to open it, though.
I'm really curious as to what's behind this door...
But I don't have time for this right now.
Should I try to pick the lock?
I don't think I need anything from here.
I have the key, so there's no point in that.
It reads "No running in the hallways."
A pinboard with some important school papers.
This isn't good for my heart...
There's a handprint on the window.
The front yard of the school is visible from here.
Better stay clear of the windows or someone might see me.
I can't see much through them.
This is the Theater Club's room. It's locked.
I don't think I need anything from here.
I may be able to find some curtains in there.
I wonder if any of the girls is a member of this club.
I'm not on great terms with them though...
But I have the key now.
How am I going to open it now...?
Maybe I should deliver that notebook.
